Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Co-editore: special issue of the "Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control" titled "The role of financial Intermediaries in Monetary Policy Transmission", Vol 43. pp 1-268.

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Partecipazione a conferenze dal 2005 al 2016, si veda file allegato
Co-organizer (with Patrizio Tirelli) of the Conference "Economic Policy and the Business Cycle" from 2007 to 2010, University of Milano-Bicocca
Seminari su invito dal 2010 a 2016, si veda file allegato

Keynote address 2013: European Parliament, Brussels, Keynote Address on the Economic Impact of the New Data Protection Regulation Working Breakfast "Data Protection, an SME Perspective", organized by European small business alliance (ESBA) at the European Parliament on 15 May 2013

Co-organizer (with Thorsten Beck and Damjan Pfajfar) of the Conference "The role of Financial Intermediaries in Monetary Policy Transmission", June 2013, Dutch National Bank http://www.dnb.nl/en/onderzoek-2/t est-conferences/other-conferences/confer ences/dnb293850.jsp

Co-organizer (With Jakob De Hann, Federica Teppa and Robert Vermeulen) of the 16th Annual Research Conference at the Dutch National Bank, October 2013, titled "The Impact of Credit on the Dynamics of SMEs" http://www.dnb.nl/en/onderzoek-2/ test-conferences/annual-research-confere nces/conferences/dnb296941.jsp

Co-organizer (with Federica Teppa and Gabriele Galati) of the 19th Annual Research Conference at the Dutch National Bank, titled "Distributional implications of the crisis and policy responses" http://www.dnb.nl/en/onderzo ek-2/test-conferences/annual-research-co nferences/conferences/dnb315736.jsp

Co-organizer (with Jakob De Hann and Robert Vermeulen) of the 20th Annual Research Conference at the Dutch National Bank, September 2016 titled Inflation in the 21st century: New policies for new challenges? http://www.dnb.nl/en/onderzoek-2/test- conferences/annual-research-conferences/ programmes/dnb346913.jsp

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: First Unicredit Post-Doc Research Grant, 2010. Title of the Project: Endogenous Market Structures and Labor Market Dynamics. Web page: http://unicreditanduniversities.eu/it/fellow/show/fellow_id/10

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Membro del collegio docenti e docente del dottorato ECONOMIA - DEFAP (Università di Milano Bicocca e Università Cattolica di Milano) Insegnamenti: Advanced Macroeconomics, Macroeconomics, Topics in Macroeconomics

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Partecipazione a prin 2008, Università di Milano Bicocca (unità locale). Titolo: Endogenous markups, business cycles and growth: The design of macroeconomic policies. Responsabile scientifico nazionale Prof. Nicola Acocella, responsabile scientifico unità locale Prof. Patrizio Tirelli.

partecipazione al progetto RAstaNEWS (Macro-Risk Assesment and Stabilization Policies with the New Early Warning Signals), Unità di Milano Bicocca. Responsabile scientifico Prof Patrizio Tirelli. Il progetto ha ricevuto finanziamento dall'unione Europea nell'ambito del European Union's Seventh Framework Programme (FP7). Webpage: http://rastanews.eu/?p=home.
Membro del WGEM- Working Group on Econometrics Models- Banca Centrale Europea (ECB)
Membro della LIFT- Low Inflation Task Force, Workstream 1: structural models - Banca Centrale Europea (ECB)

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Visiting Researcher, Research Department, Central Bank of Hungary
Visiting Schoolar, Research Department, Central Bank of Finland
Visiting Schoolar, Kiel Institute for the World Economy
Visiting Schoolar, Research Department, Central Bank of Finland
Economist, consultant, Research Department, Dutch National Bank
Financial Stability Expert, Banca Centrale Europea

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Jemolo Fellowship, University of Oxford, Nuffield College, December 2006- AWARDED but DECLINED due to Personl Reasons
